headline: M&T Bank Names Tracy Woodrow Regional President for Western New York
summary: M&T Bank (NYSE:MTB) has announced the appointment of Tracy S. Woodrow to serve as Regional President for Western New York, the company's home and headquarters for nearly 170 years. Woodrow will remain M&T Bank's Chief Administrative Officer, adding new regional leadership responsibilities to her current work overseeing human resources, corporate services, sustainability, fraud customer experience and the Buffalo Promise Neighborhood initiative.

headline: M&T Bank Corp (MTB) Q2 2025 Earnings Call Highlights: Strong Fee Income Growth and Share ...
summary: M&T Bank Corp (MTB) reports robust fee income growth and significant share repurchases, despite facing challenges in net interest margin and asset quality.

headline: MTB Q1 Deep Dive: Margin Expansion and Loan Mix Offset Deposit and CRE Headwinds
summary: Regional banking company M&T Bank (NYSE:MTB) reported Q2 CY2025 results exceeding the market’s revenue expectations, with sales up 4.1% year on year to $2.40 billion. Its GAAP profit of $4.24 per share was 6.3% above analysts’ consensus estimates.
